text: I think our approach to all the action
and to hold a gun play and to all the
weapons was more as more if you can fire
five why not fire 50 rounds every weapon
you know used in the movies just
slightly too big Marvin you know has a
gun that he can barely hold up he
definitely brings a hammer to the beetle
every time and we just thought it would
be fun to define some of the characters
through the guns they use I mean I grew
up with films like Dirty Harry and the
Magnum is an intrinsic part of who that
character is it defines him and it is
you know it's it's a it's a it's a it's
a manifestation of who he is and we just
thought it would be fun to use that idea
and just really heighten it and and and
be a little tongue-in-cheek about it and
also I have I have a really infantile
joy when it comes when it comes to
destruction so
